event_photo::title: Event Process

event_photo::text_card_1::text: Be sure to get a variety of compositions when illustrating the process. Some wide shots, close-ups and medium shots.

event_photo::text_card_0::text: Do not record every step. Just the significant steps to show the progression from beginning to end.
